channel.title: Exam 1 content on UAH Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Exam 1 content on UAH Notes

item.description:
Emergence#

Reference:

  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H4_LAyYMY_g
  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fo1D6Ir3iSI

Notes#

  • Universe tells us that everything breaks down
  • How do groups of animals move as one
    • Invisible force?
    • Emergence
  • These types of things are mostly a mystery
  • Order does not seem to be coming from the top down
    • Some rules for the organisms to follow
      • Maintain distance between organisms
      • Avoid organisms
      • Almost like the crowd rules with people
        • Or a crosswalk
        • Also like a computer playing chess
          • Organisms follow a simple set of rules
      • Sum of the parts
  • Increasingly complex levels of organization in organisms and life
    • Scientists would like to quantify emergent complexity
    • May be possible in the future

item.title: Biological Levels in Biology
item.description:
Biological Levels of Organization#

  • Cell
  • Tissue
  • Organ
  • Organ System
  • Organism
  • Population
  • Community
    • Not abiotic
  • Ecosystem
  • Biome
  • Biosphere
    • Sum of all of this

The Cell#

  • The basic unit

  • The nucleus and Atom

  • Made up of Biomolecules

  • Mitochondria

  • Makes up all living things
